Massive respect to the wonderful Aunties who care for the children 24/7 â¤ï¸â¤ï¸â¤ï¸ Patient, kind, lovingâ€¦ and very strict!

Weâ€™ve been at the orphanage for 2 days now, itâ€™s been 48 hours of love, laughter, shouting, tears, cuddles & fun â¤ï¸ The 27 children here are safe & secure, loved, very well-fed & all go to school
Good education is imperative for their future in a tough world #Ghana #Africa
